import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import bg from'./images/bg.png';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Signup(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[credentials,setcredentials]=useState({name:"",email:"",password:""});const host="https://unsrecordbend.onrender.com";const handlesubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const name=credentials.name;const email=credentials.email;const password=credentials.password;const resposne=await fetch("".concat(host,"/auth/createuser"),{method:"POST",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({name,email,password})});const json=await resposne.json();if(!json.error&&json.authtoken){console.log("success");//save authtoken
localStorage.setItem('token',json.authtoken);navigate("/");}else{alert(json.error);}};const onchange=e=>{setcredentials({...credentials,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(bg,")"),width:'80vw',height:'111vh',backgroundSize:'cover',backgroundPosition:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Signup Now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Join the hub of creativity\u2014create, share, and connect through notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handlesubmit,style:{width:'40%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3 my-5 fs-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:"Name"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"enter your name",value:credentials.name,onChange:onchange,name:"name"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3 fs-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"form-control",id:"email",onChange:onchange,placeholder:"name@example.com",value:credentials.email,name:"email"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label fs-4",children:"Create your password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"inputPassword5",className:"form-control",value:credentials.password,onChange:onchange,name:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"passwordHelpBlock",className:"form-text",children:"Your password must be 8-20 characters long"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-auto my-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary mb-3",on:true,children:"Signup"})})]})]});}
